quest.name: Bears over Flowers
journal: This charming man is quite panicked.
objectives: Slay the bear attacking the foolhardy man.

dialogue.name: PANICMAN02648
dialogue.text: You there! Please, help my friend. He's been set upon by a bear!

dialogue.name: PANICMAN02648
dialogue.text: You'll find him to the west of here.

dialogue.name: PANICMAN02648
dialogue.text: You'll find my friend to the west of here.

dialogue.name: PINCHMAN02648
dialogue.text: That was a little too close for my liking. Thanks for saving me.

dialogue.name: PINCHMAN02648
dialogue.text: You were asked to help by my friend? Would you head back and tell him I'm safe? I need to catch my breath first before I try to go anywhere.

dialogue.name: PINCHMAN02648
dialogue.text: Please head back and tell my friend I am safe.

dialogue.name: PANICMAN02648
dialogue.text: He is safe? Phew, I could not be more relieved. We often have no choice but to venture outside the village in search of wild plants.

dialogue.name: PANICMAN02648
dialogue.text: If only the bleeding earth we stand upon was more hospitable. We'd never have to put ourselves in such danger.

dialogue.name: PANICMAN02648
dialogue.text: Regardless, all that matters is that my friend is safe. Thank you.
